SEARCH
Module com.example.stockgame
Package com.example.stockgame

Class Stock

java.lang.Object
com.example.stockgame.Stock
Direct Known Subclasses:
HighRiskStock, LowRiskStock, MidRiskStock
public abstract class Stock extends Object
Abstract class representing a stock in the stock market game. It defines the basic properties and behavior that all types of stocks share.

  • Constructor Details

    • Stock

      public Stock(String symbol, double price, double amountOwned, double MIN_FLUCTUATION, double MAX_FLUCTUATION, double GROWTH_BIAS, double PRICE_FLOOR)
      Constructor to initialize a stock with its properties.
      Parameters:
      symbol - Symbol of the stock.
      price - Initial price of the stock.
      amountOwned - Initial amount of this stock owned.
      MIN_FLUCTUATION - Minimum fluctuation percentage.
      MAX_FLUCTUATION - Maximum fluctuation percentage.
      GROWTH_BIAS - Growth bias to influence the stock's trend.
      PRICE_FLOOR - The lowest price the stock can fall to.

    • getRiskLevel

      public abstract String getRiskLevel()
      Abstract method to get the risk level of the stock. To be implemented by subclasses.
      Returns:
      String representing the risk level of the stock.

    • updatePrice

      public void updatePrice()
      Updates the price of the stock based on its fluctuation range, growth bias, and ensures it doesn't fall below the price floor.
